headline: Sherwin-Williams Declares Dividend of $0.79 per Common Share
summary: The Board of Directors of The Sherwin-Williams Company (NYSE: SHW) today announced a regular quarterly dividend of $0.79 per common share payable on December 5, 2025, to shareholders of record on November 14, 2025.

headline: Sherwin-Williams (SHW) Earnings Expected to Grow: What to Know Ahead of Next Week's Release
summary: Sherwin-Williams (SHW) possesses the right combination of the two key ingredients for a likely earnings beat in its upcoming report. Get prepared with the key expectations.
